item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M5053,3840h-216v-3840h216v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 御裁許今月八日夜於社務在京之宿坊召出彼代祐見浄随等

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M4798,3840h-225v-3840h225v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 及對決沙汰之處如祐見申者既年来右衛門四郎為道秀之

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M4522,3840h-215v-3840h215v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 養子無貮之處以一往折檻状稱義絶之證文掠申　公方

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M4250,3840h-221v-3840h221v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 令押領云々如浄随申者右衛門四郎雖為異姓他人道秀

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M3967,3840h-227v-3840h227v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 収養之段勿論也但依有不儀之子細慥令義絶之由道秀之

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M3677,3840h-228v-3840h228v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 自筆状二通明鏡也仍宗貞者道秀之甥也荷物資財等

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M3368,3840h-227v-3840h227v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 宗貞可相計之旨同載彼状畢且宗貞可相傳之由道秀

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M3090,3840h-185v-3840h185v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 申置之条無其隠且先度被經御沙汰被成下御教書云々

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M2389,3840h-216v-3840h216v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 爰祐見重申之宗貞出帯證状不審多端云々然者加披見

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M2127,3840h-229v-3840h229v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 可差申謀書廉之旨雖申含彼状披見事祐見再三辞

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M1826,3840h-211v-3840h211v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 退訖尚以責伏之間雖披見彼状曽以不差申謀書廉将又

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M1551,3840h-208v-3840h208v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 先立避与屋一宇幷苧拾駄可和平之旨以浄通入道令

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M1262,3840h-197v-3840h197v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 籌策之趣祐見雖申之於浄随者更不存知仕之由申之

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M983,3840h-209v-3840h209v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 加之祐見申詞條々参差無理忽令顯然之次第社務

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M700,3840h-232v-3840h232v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 幷奉行人為種貞元秀藤等言上仕也此上者可被付宗貞之由

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M446,3840h-231v-3840h231v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 被　仰下訖仍就望申可被成下安堵御教書於宗貞也矣
